definition: to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: It fastens with a hook and eye.
He shoved the gun into his waistband and buttoned his jacket over it.
sentences.chinese: 迅速插在裤腰带上，把上衣拉展，盖好，扣上钮子。

definition: to tag sb with unfair label/power word
